verses.t: Then{G3767} Jesus{G2424} six{G1803} days{G2250} before{G4253} the passover{G3957} came{G2064} to{G1519} Bethany{G963}, where{G3699} Lazarus{G2976} was{G2258} which had been dead{G2348}, whom{G3739} he raised{G1453} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}.
There{G1563} they made{G4160} him{G846} a supper{G1173}; and{G2532} Martha{G3588} served{G1247}: but{G1161} Lazarus{G2976} was{G2258} one{G1520} of them that sat at the table{G4873} with him{G846}.

Then{G3767} saith{G3004} one{G1520} of{G1537} his{G846} disciples{G3588}, Judas{G2455} Iscariot{G2469}, Simon's{G4613} son, which should{G3195} betray{G3860} him{G846},
Why was{G5101} not{G3756} this{G5124} ointment{G3588} sold{G4097} for{G1223} three hundred{G5145} pence{G1220}, and{G2532} given{G1325} to the poor{G4434}?

This{G5124} he said{G2036}, not{G3756} that{G3754} he{G846} cared{G3199} for{G4012} the poor{G4434}; but{G235} because{G3754} he was{G2258} a thief{G2812}, and{G2532} had{G2192} the bag{G3588}, and{G2532} bare{G941} what was put therein{G906}.

For{G1063} the poor{G4434} always{G3842} ye have{G2192} with{G3326} you{G1438}; but{G1161} me{G1691} ye have{G2192} not{G3756} always{G3842}.

Much{G4183} people{G3793} of{G1537} the Jews{G2453} therefore{G3767} knew{G1097} that{G3754} he was{G2076} there{G1563}: and{G2532} they came{G2064} not{G3756} for{G1223} Jesus'{G3588} sake{G1223} only{G3440}, but{G235} that{G2443} they might see{G1492} Lazarus{G3588} also{G2532}, whom{G3739} he had raised{G1453} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}.
But{G1161} the chief priests{G3588} consulted{G1011} that{G2443} they might put{G615} Lazarus{G3588} also{G2532} to death{G615};
Because{G3754} that by reason of{G1223} him{G846} many{G4183} of the Jews{G2453} went away{G5217}, and{G2532} believed{G4100} on{G1519} Jesus{G3588}.
On the next day{G1887} much{G4183} people{G3793} that{G3588} were come{G2064} to{G1519} the feast{G3588}, when they heard{G191} that{G3754} Jesus{G3588} was coming{G2064} to{G1519} Jerusalem{G2414},

And{G1161} Jesus{G3588}, when he had found{G2147} a young ass{G3678}, sat{G2523} thereon{G1909}; as{G2531} it is{G2076} written{G1125},
Fear{G5399} not{G3361}, daughter{G2364} of Sion{G4622}: behold{G2400}, thy{G4675} King{G3588} cometh{G2064}, sitting{G2521} on{G1909} an ass's{G3688} colt{G4454}.

For{G1223} this{G5124} cause{G1223} the people{G3588} also{G2532} met{G5221} him{G846}, for that{G3754} they heard that{G191} he{G846} had done{G4160} this{G5124} miracle{G3588}.

The Pharisees{G5330} therefore{G3767} said{G2036} among{G4314} themselves{G1438}, Perceive ye{G2334} how{G3754} ye prevail nothing{G3762}? behold{G1492}, the world{G3588} is gone{G565} after{G3694} him{G846}.
And{G1161} there were{G2258} certain{G5100} Greeks{G1672} among{G1537} them that came up{G305} to worship{G4352} at{G1722} the feast{G3588}:

The same{G3778} came{G4334} therefore{G3767} to Philip{G5376}, which was of{G575} Bethsaida{G966} of Galilee{G3588}, and{G2532} desired{G2065} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, Sir{G2962}, we would{G2309} see{G1492} Jesus{G3588}.

And{G1161} Jesus{G2424} answered{G611} them{G846}, saying{G3004}, The hour{G3588} is come{G2064}, that{G2443} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} should be glorified{G1392}.

Verily{G281}, verily{G281}, I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, Except{G1437} a corn{G3588} of wheat{G3588} fall{G4098} into{G1519} the ground{G3588} and die{G599}, it{G846} abideth{G3306} alone{G3441}: but{G1161} if{G1437} it die{G599}, it bringeth forth{G5342} much{G4183} fruit{G2590}.

He that loveth{G5368} his{G846} life{G3588} shall lose{G622} it{G846}; and{G2532} he that hateth{G3404} his{G846} life{G3588} in{G1722} this{G5129} world{G3588} shall keep{G5442} it{G846} unto{G1519} life{G2222} eternal{G166}.

If{G1437} any man{G5100} serve{G1247} me{G1698}, let him follow{G190} me{G1698}; and{G2532} where{G3699} I{G1473} am{G1510}, there{G1563} shall{G2071} also{G2532} my{G1699} servant{G3588} be{G2071}: if{G1437} any man{G5100} serve{G1247} me{G1698}, him{G846} will{G5091} my Father{G3588} honour{G5091}.

Now{G3568} is{G5015} my{G3450} soul{G3588} troubled{G5015}; and{G2532} what{G5101} shall I say{G2036}? Father{G3962}, save{G4982} me{G3165} from{G1537} this{G3778} hour{G3588}: but{G235} for{G1223} this{G5124} cause{G1223} came I{G2064} unto{G1519} this{G3778} hour{G3588}.

Father{G3962}, glorify{G1392} thy{G4675} name{G3588}. Then{G3767} came there{G2064} a voice{G5456} from{G1537} heaven{G3588}, saying, I have{G1392} both{G2532} glorified{G1392} it, and{G2532} will glorify{G1392} it again{G3825}.
The people{G3767} therefore{G3793}, that stood by{G2476}, and{G2532} heard{G191} it, said that{G3004} it{G1096} thundered{G1027}: others{G243} said{G3004}, An angel{G32} spake{G2980} to him{G846}.
Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036}, This{G3778} voice{G3588} came{G1096} not{G3756} because{G1223} of me{G1691}, but{G235} for{G1223} your{G5209} sakes{G1223}.
Now{G3568} is{G2076} the judgment{G2920} of{G3588} this{G5127} world{G2889}: now{G3568} shall{G1544} the prince{G3588} of{G3588} this{G5127} world{G2889} be cast{G1544} out{G1854}.
And I{G2504}, if{G1437} I be lifted up{G5312} from{G1537} the earth{G3588}, will draw{G1670} all{G3956} men unto{G4314} me{G1683}.
This{G5124} he said{G3004}, signifying{G4591} what{G4169} death{G2288} he should{G3195} die{G599}.

The people{G3588} answered{G611} him{G846}, We{G2249} have heard{G191} out{G1537} of the law{G3588} that{G3754} Christ{G3588} abideth{G3306} for{G1519} ever{G3588}: and{G2532} how{G4459} sayest{G3004} thou{G4771}, The Son{G3588} of man{G3588} must{G1163} be lifted up{G5312}? who{G5101} is{G2076} this{G3778} Son{G3588} of man{G3588}?

Then{G3767} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Yet{G2089} a little{G3398} while{G5550} is{G2076} the light{G3588} with{G3326} you{G5216}. Walk{G4043} while{G2193} ye have{G2192} the light{G3588}, lest{G2443} darkness{G4653} come upon{G2638} you{G5209}: for{G2532} he that walketh{G4043} in{G1722} darkness{G3588} knoweth{G1492} not{G3756} whither{G4226} he goeth{G5217}.

While{G2193} ye have{G2192} light{G3588}, believe{G4100} in{G1519} the light{G3588}, that{G2443} ye may be{G1096} the children{G5207} of light{G5457}. These things{G5023}spake{G2980} Jesus{G3588}, and{G2532} departed{G565}, and did hide himself{G2928} from{G575} them{G846}.
But{G1161} though{G4160} he{G846} had done{G4160} so many{G5118} miracles{G4592} before{G1715} them{G846}, yet they believed{G4100} not{G3756} on{G1519} him{G846}:

That{G2443} the saying{G3588} of Esaias{G2268} the prophet{G3588} might be fulfilled{G4137}, which{G3739} he spake{G2036}, Lord{G2962}, who{G5101} hath believed{G4100} our{G2257} report{G3588}? and{G2532} to whom{G5101} hath{G601} the arm{G3588} of the Lord{G2962} been revealed{G601}?

He hath blinded{G5186} their{G846} eyes{G3588}, and{G2532} hardened{G4456} their{G846} heart{G3588}; that{G2443} they should{G1492} not{G3361} see{G1492} with{G3588} their eyes{G3788}, nor{G2532} understand{G3539} with{G3588} their heart{G2588}, and{G2532} be converted{G1994}, and{G2532} I should heal{G2390} them{G846}.
These things{G5023} said{G2036} Esaias{G2268}, when{G3753} he saw{G1492} his{G846} glory{G3588}, and{G2532} spake{G2980} of{G4012} him{G846}.

Nevertheless{G3676} among{G1537} the chief rulers{G3588} also{G2532} many{G4183} believed{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846}; but{G235} because{G1223} of the Pharisees{G3588} they did{G3670} not{G3756} confess{G3670} him, lest{G2443} they should be{G1096} put out of the synagogue{G656}:

And{G2532} he that seeth{G2334} me{G1691} seeth{G2334} him that sent{G3992} me{G3165}.
I{G1473} am come{G2064} a light{G5457} into{G1519} the world{G3588}, that{G2443} whosoever{G3956} believeth{G4100} on{G1519} me{G1691} should{G3306} not{G3361} abide{G3306} in{G1722} darkness{G3588}.

And{G2532} if{G1437} any man{G5100} hear{G191} my{G3450} words{G3588}, and{G2532} believe{G4100} not{G3361}, I{G1473} judge{G2919} him{G846} not{G3756}: for{G1063} I came{G2064} not{G3756} to{G2443} judge{G2919} the world{G3588}, but{G235} to{G2443} save{G4982} the world{G3588}.

He that rejecteth{G114} me{G1691}, and{G2532} receiveth{G2983} not{G3361} my{G3450} words{G3588}, hath{G2192} one that judgeth{G2919} him{G846}: the word{G3588} that{G3739} I have spoken{G2980}, the same{G1565} shall judge{G2919} him{G846} in{G1722} the last{G2078} day{G2250}.

For{G3754} I{G1473} have{G2980} not{G3756} spoken{G2980} of{G1537} myself{G1683}; but{G235}the Father{G3962} which sent{G3992} me{G3165}, he{G846} gave{G1325} me{G3427} a commandment{G1785}, what{G5101} I should say{G2036}, and{G2532} what{G5101} I should speak{G2980}.

And{G2532} I know{G1492} that{G3754} his{G846} commandment{G3588} is{G2076} life{G2222} everlasting{G166}: whatsoever{G3739} I{G1473} speak{G2980} therefore{G3767}, even as{G2531} the Father{G3588} said{G2046} unto me{G3427}, so{G3779} I speak{G2980}.
